task_name: Define target role, timeline, and success criteria
description: Choose a target role (e.g., ML Engineer, Applied Scientist) and define measurable outcomes (projects shipped, skills, applications).
Create a clean Python environment (conda/venv), install key libraries, and set up a GitHub repo structure for notes and projects.

task_name: Refresh math foundations (linear algebra + calculus basics)
description: Review vectors, matrices, derivatives, and gradients with focus on ML intuition.
Complete a small notebook-based project (data cleaning + EDA) to reinforce core tooling.
Work through a structured ML curriculum: supervised learning, evaluation, feature engineering, and model selection.
Cover neural networks, backpropagation, regularization, optimization, and practical training workflows.

task_name: Build and ship a capstone ML project
description: Deliver an end-to-end project (data ingestion -> training -> evaluation -> deployment demo). Focus on clarity and reproducibility.

task_name: Add basic MLOps practices to the capstone
description: Add experiment tracking, simple CI checks, and a reproducible training pipeline.
